Why is this method synchronized?
Please see the next comment

Before returning, we need to store this scopeDTOs a class-level variable with a proper synchronization mechanism. When calling this method again we can just return that without going into the nested loops. Otherwise, going through this over and over again when calling the method is not a good idea.
Can you have a look at https://www.cs.umd.edu/~pugh/java/memoryModel/DoubleCheckedLocking.html under "Fixing Double-Checked Locking using Volatile"
